Class DrawingContext.Modifier

java.lang.Object
xyz.gmitch215.socketmc.util.render.DrawingContext.Modifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Paramaterized
Enclosing class:
DrawingContext
public static final class DrawingContext.Modifier extends Object implements Serializable, Paramaterized
Represents a modifier for a specific DrawingContext.Command.
